p.k: Tomo Okabe is a pioneer in glute training, helping women build larger bottoms. Her goal is to help women become stronger. We follow her for a month as she changes people's hearts from the bottom up.
p.d: Nicknamed "Beautiful Bottom Magician," 33-year-old Tomo Okabe is a pioneer in glute training. Women flock to her in order to build large, round bottoms. Okabe's goal, however, is to change people's hearts from the bottom up. Why does she do this? As we follow her, she tells us about her past, including a life-changing break-up. Work, romance, marriage ... Okabe's customers have many worries, and her goal is to help them live with confidence in themselves. For 1 month, we follow Okabe as she pours everything into her work to help women to grow stronger.
